amendment.description: To convey clear information to Congress and the public about projected Federal outlays, revenues, surpluses, and deficits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 597 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 597 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Johnson. (consideration: CR S1980-1981; text: CR S1981) To convey clear information to Congress and the public about projected Federal outlays, revenues, surpluses, and deficits.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 597 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 597 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Johnson.
